books.title: Half of a yellow sun
books.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
books.description: A masterly, haunting novel from a writer heralded by The Washington Post Book World as “the 21st-century daughter of Chinua Achebe,” Half of a Yellow Sun recreates a seminal moment in modern African history: Biafra’s impassionedstruggle to establish an independent republic in Nigeria, and the chilling violence that followed.
books.subject: Fiction

reviews.1236: I loved this book. Very educational

books.title: Purple Hibiscus
books.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
books.description: Kambili, a young girl is raised in a catholic home run by her authocratic father. This book tells of her journey of living amidst such strictness while managing to find her place in life.
books.subject: Fiction

books.title: And the Shoffar Blew
books.author: Francine Rivers
books.description: A pastor tries to find balance in his career and life
books.subject: Religion
